name: @feeefapp/mcp
description: Enable AI assistants to interact seamlessly with Feeef e-commerce stores, products, and orders using powerful filtering and management tools. Authenticate securely to access user-specific data and perform advanced queries on stores, products, and orders. Simplify e-commerce operations by integrating comprehensive Feeef API capabilities into your AI workflows.

tools.name: users_auth_me

schema_doc.notes: Primary tool for session validation and profile retrieval
schema_doc.output: Complete User profile object with verification timestamps
schema_doc.permissions: Self-access only; no additional permissions required

tools.description: Retrieve complete profile information for the currently authenticated user. Returns user identity, contact details, verification status, and custom metadata. Essential for session validation and profile display.

tools.name: users_auth_update

schema_doc.notes: Self-modification only; comprehensive field validation and business rules
schema_doc.behavior: PATCH semantics; verification reset on email/phone changes
schema_doc.validation: Phone regex, email uniqueness, name length, URL format

tools.description: Update authenticated user profile with comprehensive validation. Supports name, email, phone, avatar, and custom metadata changes. Includes uniqueness checking and format validation for business compliance.

name.description: Display name (2-32 characters). Shown in UI components, order confirmations, and communications. Supports Unicode for international names.

email.description: Contact email address (RFC-compliant format). Must be unique across all users. Used for notifications, password recovery, and account verification.

phone.description: Phone number in Palestinian/regional format. Mobile: 0591234567 (05/06/07 + 8 digits). Landline: 022345678 (02 + 7 digits). Used for SMS notifications and 2FA.

metadata.description: Custom JSON metadata for app-specific data. Store user preferences, integration tokens, custom fields. Limit: <10KB for performance. Avoid sensitive data.

photoUrl.description: Profile avatar image URL. Must be valid HTTP/HTTPS URL. HTTPS preferred for security. Empty value may display default avatar. Recommended size: 200x200px.

tools.name: stores_list
tools.description: List stores with comprehensive filtering options for merchant management. Requires user authentication. Mirrors backend store listing schema.

name.description: Exact store name match for filtering

user.description: User ID of the authenticated user (required - get from "me" tool first)

limit.description: Number of stores to return (default: backend default, max: 50)

tools.name: stores_create
tools.description: Create a new store with comprehensive configuration options matching backend CreateStoreSchema. Requires name, slug, and userId.

slug.description: URL-safe store identifier (2-32 chars, lowercase, hyphens allowed, globally unique)

userId.description: User ID who will own this store (required)

ondarkLogoUrl.description: Logo variant for dark backgrounds URL

tools.name: stores_update
tools.description: Update a store by ID. Supports core fields and the full 'integrations' object (UpdateStoreSchema subset).

tools.name: stores_i10s_meta_pixel_set
tools.description: Set or modify the Meta Pixel integration on a store. Replace / merge / remove metaPixel subtree (objective, draft_objective, active, pixels).

mode.description: Operation mode: merge (default), replace, or remove

pixels.description: Full list of pixels to set (use with mode=replace or merge to override list)

addPixels.description: Pixels to add (only used when pixels is not provided)

removePixelIds.description: Pixel IDs to remove (only used when pixels is not provided)

tools.name: stores_i10s_tiktok_pixel_set
tools.description: Set or modify the TikTok Pixel integration on a store. Replace / merge / remove tiktokPixel subtree (objective, draft_objective, active, pixels).

mode.description: Operation mode: merge (default), replace, or remove

pixels.description: Full list of pixels to set (use with mode=replace or merge to override list)

addPixels.description: Pixels to add (only used when pixels is not provided)

removePixelIds.description: Pixel IDs to remove (only used when pixels is not provided)

tools.name: products_list

schema_doc.notes: Full-text search across multiple fields; supports published status filtering
schema_doc.pricing: Returns calculated final prices after discounts/variants

tools.description: Retrieve products from a store with advanced filtering. Supports full-text search across names/descriptions/SKUs, exact field matching, price ranges, and pagination. Essential for inventory management and customer product discovery.

q.description: Full-text search across name, id, slug, description, and price fields. Matches partial strings with LIKE operator.

page.description: Page number for pagination (1-based). Default: 1. Use with limit to control result sets for large inventories.

limit.description: Maximum products per page. Default varies by backend configuration. Recommended: 10-50 for UI display, 100 for bulk operations.

store_id.description: REQUIRED: Store identifier (UUID format). User must have read access to this store. Use stores_list to discover available store IDs.

published.description: Filter by published status. When true, excludes archived products. When false, shows all including archived.

tools.name: products_create

schema_doc.notes: Full e-commerce product creation with advanced features
schema_doc.pricing: Supports variants, offers, addons with complex calculation logic
schema_doc.validation: Slug uniqueness, enum constraints, URL format validation

tools.description: Create a new product with comprehensive e-commerce features. Supports variants, pricing tiers, rich content, inventory tracking, and advanced catalog management. Essential for building complete product listings.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit - internal identifier for inventory systems. Used for warehouse management, reporting, and integration with external systems.

body.description: Rich content description (max 10MB). Supports HTML/Markdown for detailed specifications, features, sizing guides, and marketing content.

cost.description: Internal acquisition/production cost (0-10M). Used for profit margin calculations (margin = final_price - cost). Never displayed to customers.

name.description: REQUIRED: Product display name (max 255 chars). Shown in listings, cart, and order confirmations. Should be customer-facing and descriptive.

slug.description: REQUIRED: Unique URL identifier (2-255 chars). Must be globally unique across all products. Recommend lowercase with hyphens. Used in product URLs and SEO.

type.description: Product type affecting fulfillment. Must be valid ProductType enum: 'physical' (requires shipping), 'digital' (download/email), 'service' (appointment/booking).

media.description: Additional gallery media URLs/IDs. Array of valid URLs for images/videos. Displayed in order shown. Supports various formats.

price.description: REQUIRED: Base unit price (0-10M). This is the primary selling price before discounts. Supports decimal values for precise pricing.

stock.description: Available inventory units (0-10M). Decremented on order confirmation. If omitted/null, treated as unlimited/untracked inventory.

title.description: SEO page title override (max 255 chars). If omitted, uses product name. Important for search engine optimization and browser tabs.

addons.description: Optional purchasable extras (ProductAddonSchema[]). Additional items customers can add: [{photoUrl?, title, subtitle?, stock?, price?, min?, max?}]. Added to line item total.

offers.description: Quantity-based pricing tiers (ProductOfferSchema[]). Bulk discount configuration: [{code, title, subtitle?, price?, minQuantity?, maxQuantity?, freeShipping?}]. First matching offer overrides unit price.

status.description: REQUIRED: Product lifecycle status. Must be valid ProductStatus enum value: 'draft' (hidden/editing), 'published' (visible/purchasable), 'archived' (hidden/discontinued), 'deleted' (removed).

barcode.description: External barcode identifier (UPC/EAN/etc). Stored as string despite model showing number. Used for POS integration and inventory scanning.

storeId.description: REQUIRED: Store identifier (UUID). User must have product creation permissions for this store. Maps to backend storeId field.

variant.description: Product variant configuration (ProductVariantSchema). Defines size/color/style options with individual pricing: {name, view, options: [{name, sku?, barcode?, price?, discount?, stock?, type, value?, mediaId?, hidden?}]}

category.description: Primary category assignment (EmbeddedCategorySchema). Defines main product classification for navigation and filtering.

discount.description: Absolute monetary discount from base price (0-10M). Final unit price = max(0, price - discount). Can be overridden by variant options.

metadata.description: Custom JSON data for extensions/integrations. Arbitrary key-value pairs. Limit to <10KB for performance. Not displayed to customers.

photoUrl.description: Primary product image URL. Must be valid HTTP/HTTPS URL. Displayed in listings and product pages. Empty shows placeholder image.

categories.description: Multiple category assignments (EmbeddedCategorySchema[]). Allows product to appear in multiple catalog sections.

description.description: Short marketing description (max 255 chars). Displayed in product listings and search results. Should highlight key features/benefits.

shippingMethodId.description: Restricts product to specific shipping method (UUID). Maps to shippingMethodId. If omitted, inherits store's default shipping options.

tools.name: products_update
tools.description: Update an existing product by ID (UpdateProductSchema).

tools.name: orders_list
tools.description: List orders with rich filters. Requires store_id. Supports status/payment_status/delivery_status/custom_status arrays, date ranges, tags, products, confirmer, sort.

items.description: Filter by product_id in items JSONB (legacy)

status.description: Filter by order status or list of statuses

products.description: Filter by product IDs (any match in items)

createdAfter.description: ISO date-time inclusive lower bound for created_at

updatedAfter.description: ISO date-time inclusive lower bound for updated_at

createdBefore.description: ISO date-time inclusive upper bound for created_at

updatedBefore.description: ISO date-time inclusive upper bound for updated_at

tools.name: orders_show
tools.description: Show a single order by ID.

tools.name: orders_create
tools.description: Create a new order as store owner (CreateOrderSchema). Provide items[]. All inputs snake_case; nested item keys mapped.

tools.name: orders_update
tools.description: Update an order by ID (UpdateOrderSchema). Provide only changed fields.

tools.name: orders_destroy
tools.description: Delete an order by ID.

tools.name: orders_assign
tools.description: Assign a single order to a member (confirmer).

tools.name: orders_assign_many
tools.description: Assign multiple orders to a member (confirmer).

tools.name: orders_send
tools.description: Send a guest order (public). Follows SendOrderSchema subset.

tools.name: orders_track
tools.description: Track an order by ID (public).

tools.name: orders_calculate
tools.description: Calculate order totals without creating an order (public).
